restaurant.name: OK Cafe
restaurant.description: A legendary Southern kitchen serving comfort food made from family recipes since 1987, beloved by generations in Atlanta. Warm hospitality, classic flavors, and an art-filled space that feels like home for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
